title: Dylan Johnson’s Breakthrough: From Mired in the Middle Ranks of Gravel Racing to Top-10 at Unbound
content:
After a career best finish at Unbound Gravel, the YouTuber is feeling more stoked on racing than ever.

Read the full article at Dylan Johnson’s Breakthrough: From Mired in the Middle Ranks of Gravel Racing to Top-10 at Unbound on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
